pageContext.collection_title: IMRU Radio sound recordings and administrative records
pageContext.collection_description: Open reel audiotape, audiocassettes, compact discs, production files, administrative records, banners, and other material, 1970-2011, from IMRU Radio, an LGBT radio program airing on KPFK Pacifica Radio in Los Angeles.
collectionFormats: Optical disc (including CD, CD-R, CD-RW, DVD, DVD-R, DVD-RW, VCD)
